3629.verse: وَلَا|And not|72|80|25$تَنفَعُ|benefits|73|89|11637$ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ|the intercession|126|142|11638$عِندَهُۥٓ|with Him|80|96|1264$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$لِمَنْ|for (one) whom|122|138|1356$أَذِنَ|He permits|90|98|8206$لَهُۚۥ|for him.|70|82|977$حَتَّىٰٓ|Until|64|89|526$إِذَا|when|55|80|1370$فُزِّعَ|fear is removed|122|147|14271$عَن|on|54|79|1105$قُلُوبِهِمْ|their hearts,|102|127|66$قَالُواْ|they will say,|108|120|101$مَاذَا|`What is that -|123|144|271$قَالَ رَبُّكُمْۖ|your Lord has said?`|156|197|14272$قَالُواْ|They will say,|111|152|101$ٱلْحَقَّۖ|`The truth.`|104|145|436$وَهُوَ|And He|67|88|305$ٱلْعَلِىُّ|(is) the Most High,|144|347|2283$ٱلْكَبِيرُ|the Most Great.|125|328|9356$

3631.verse: قُل|Say,|50|64|765$لَّا|`Not|51|79|30$تُسْــَٔلُونَ|you will be asked|133|161|1229$عَمَّآ|about what|96|124|724$أَجْرَمْنَا|(the) sins we committed|182|210|14274$وَلَا|and not|71|85|25$نُسْــَٔلُ|we will be asked|128|218|14275$عَمَّا|about what|96|276|724$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do.`|92|182|725$

3634.verse: وَمَآ|And not|72|79|46$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|We have sent you|141|156|1101$إِلَّا|except|65|80|86$كَآفَّةً|inclusively|87|102|1822$لِّلنَّاسِ|to mankind|92|107|787$بَشِيرًا|(as) a giver of glad tidings|195|202|1102$وَنَذِيرًا|and (as) a warner.|144|156|1103$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|But|78|102|952$أَكْثَرَ|most|64|88|2155$ٱلنَّاسِ|[the] people|102|126|75$لَا|(do) not|75|99|30$يَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|104|115$

3637.verse: وَقَالَ|And say|73|84|1089$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|111|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|111|59$لَن|`Never will|91|113|524$نُّؤْمِنَ|we believe|90|112|3564$بِهَـٰذَا|in this|66|88|273$ٱلْقُرْءَانِ|Quran|95|106|10369$وَلَا|and not|71|88|25$بِٱلَّذِى|in (that) which|119|153|597$بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِۗ|(was) before it.`|132|166|920$وَلَوْ|But if|55|89|179$تَرَىٰٓ|you (could) see|124|158|5175$إِذِ|when|55|72|5836$ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ|the wrongdoers|123|129|2019$مَوْقُوفُونَ|will be made to stand|162|174|14284$عِندَ|before|62|74|521$رَبِّهِمْ|their Lord,|88|100|54$يَرْجِعُ|will throw back|119|131|11582$بَعْضُهُمْ|some of them|110|116|736$إِلَىٰ|to|53|63|118$بَعْضٍ|others|76|96|1316$ٱلْقَوْلَ|the word.|84|104|9359$يَقُولُ|Will say|70|90|77$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|109|20$ٱسْتُضْعِفُواْ|were oppressed|124|144|6553$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|118|750$ٱسْتَكْبَرُواْ|were arrogant,|118|129|6552$لَوْلَآ|`If not|65|88|1090$أَنتُمْ|(for) you|79|102|796$لَكُنَّا|certainly we (would) have been|230|252|6197$مُؤْمِنِينَ|believers.`|93|104|879$

3629.verse: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.

3630.verse: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."

3631.verse: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."

3632.verse: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge."

3633.verse: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

3634.verse: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know.

3635.verse: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

3636.verse: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day [when] you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede [it]."

3637.verse: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers."
